ygData.subject: The X-Predacons formulate a plan
ygData.msgSnippet: As the wars rage on prehistoric Earth, some point in the distant future, a war is currently breaking lose. Near the edge of the Cybertronian system flashes of

Subject: The X-Predacons formulate a plan
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

As the wars rage on prehistoric Earth, some point in the distant future, a 
war is currently breaking lose. Near the edge of the Cybertronian system 
flashes of light can be seen on the planet Cybertron as a massive battle is 
being waged between a sub faction of Predacons defend themselves against a 
previously unknown threat. On Cybertron and in its orbit predacon and maximal 
alike watch on view screens as cloaked Predacon Ravens(Ravages ship) are torn 
apart from plasts from massive ships shaped somewhat liek Pyramids. Other 
ships seemingly all black and made of energy also appear as massive swarms of 
small black attack craft seemingly appear out of no where from around the 
ships. One by one space stations are diabed by vast amount of firepower sent 
at them at the outrageous number of ships. Near the back of the Fleet 
currently engaging the massive fleet, the main X-Predacon Space station, The 
Reckoning, float as inside alarms blare, and bots run about in all 
directions. In another part of the ship a large towering figure stands over 
seven other figures. The shadowy figure looks to them all one by one before 
he begins to speak.

????: "You seven are the most Elite Force for our orginization. In the past 
predacons and Maximals sent ment back to Prehistoric Earth to alter time, the 
Predacons did however. As we can see... they suceeded. However when they did 
they altered out time and now these new creatures attack us relentlesly. We 
will eb evacuating soon to our secondary base... there we will give you craft 
togo back in time and see that our history is changed."

One of the robots steps foward and bows to the shadowy bot before standing 
straight again.

Vile: "Sir, the Vile Force is prepared to serve the X-Predacons in anyway."

The shadowy bot nods and laughs before a door opens behind him. All 8 of the 
robots step out of the room and make their way to another ship waiting in the 
stations docking bay. Just then the base is struck by a series of blasts 
making it shake terribly. QUickly all 8 board the ship which soon makes use 
of the advanced warp gate technology and begins to glow a bright purple 
before it dissapears.. entirely....

--part1_7d.15bd1b3c.2845b5e2_boundary
